accents-homewares.Name: Pièrre Floor Mirror
accents-homewares.Body: With nods to neoclassicism this versatile mirror is designed to make a statement. His steel structure exudes strength while rattan accents and spherical walnut feet design. Equally suitable for living spaces and bedrooms, Pièrre likes to be seen.

accents-homewares.Name: Gabriella Floor Mirror
accents-homewares.Body: With island vibes and a ‘70s style, the Gabriella mirror features hand-applied rattan detailing that will imbue your home with the spirit of summer all year round. Gabriella is available in a full-length floor or wall-mounted design.

beds.Name: Yoko King Bed
beds.Body: With her bold spherical feet and plank style frame, she is an expression of craftsmanship and quality. Inspired by Japanese minimalism with considered contemporary proportions: the perfect marriage of subtle yet directional design and everyday functionality.

beds.Name: Yoko King Bed

bedsides.Name: Piscina Side Table
bedsides.Body: Piscina meaning “pool” in Italian lives up to her name through her beautiful pool shaped form. Designed as a nesting set alongside her coffee table sibling, Piscina is a tactile accent piece made from Cosmos marble carved into a smooth irregular shape. Sitting atop 3 gloss steel legs that are tonally matched to the marble. Suitable for living and bedroom spaces.

bedsides.Name: Isola Side Table
bedsides.Body: A marriage of sophistication and form, modelled from two beach pebbles. Isola is sculpted from upcycled engineered timber, combining organic, sculptural form with the sophistication of a hand buffed piano gloss finish. Isola brings an effortless high design aesthetic to your living space.

bedsides.Name: Pepé Side Table
bedsides.Body: Constructed from ash and walnut veneer atop a solid timber and steel frame, Pepé sits comfortably in myriad spaces within the home. Suited as a bedside table, an end table alongside a sofa or as a sculptural accent piece in hallways or other parts of the home.

bedsides.Name: Pièrre Side Table
bedsides.Body: Taking inspiration from neoclassicist designs, the Pièrre side table has rattan details, playful spherical walnut feet and a creamy marble top.

bedsides.Name: Freddie Side Table
bedsides.Body: Freddie is a versatile side table for smaller bedrooms or living areas. He also doubles as additional seating for extra unexpected guests. Freddie likes sunsets and listening to Bohemian Rhapsody on repeat - obviously.

guardsman.Name: Upholstery (Fabric) Care Products
guardsman.Body: Guardsman fabric care products keep fabric upholsteries looking their best from the moment they arrive in your home, and never affect the original look or feel of fabric. Deep clean with the Fabric Care Kit and safeguard fabric upholstery from potentially damaging spills and stains with the Fabric Protector Aerosol.

guardsman.Name: Upholstery (Fabric) Care Products

guardsman.Name: Upholstery (Leather) Care Products
guardsman.Body: Guardsman’s Clean & Renew and Protect & Preserve leather care products are suitable for all your leather products. From vinyl to top coated (protected or pigmented) leather, through to pull-up and full aniline leathers, Guardsman care for it all.

guardsman.Name: Timber Care Products
guardsman.Body: Guardsman Wood Care Kit will help you to keep your new wood furniture looking as good as the day it arrived.

guardsman.Name: Stone Care Products
guardsman.Body: Natural stone is a beautiful addition to your home. To keep it looking its best use Guardsman Stone Care Products as they will protect natural stone and sealing.

chromeo.Body: This statement piece harnesses a curved chrome finish frame with bolster cushion detailing, resulting in a geometric silhouette. Secured with a firm sitting position, Chromeo offers comfort with the addition of a footrest that adds to its simple, sculptural beauty, helping it transform the everyday into a piece of art.

coffee-and-side-tables.Body: With his chubby oak legs and thick marble top, Chub is a versatile addition to any living space. Compact in size but he packs a punch in design. Perfect for apartments and smaller spaces.

consoles.Name: Luca Console
consoles.Body: Meet Luca, a console whose proportions are substantial and delicate in equal measure. Constructed from ash and walnut veneer atop a solid timber and steel frame, Luca is best used as a sculptural focal point within hallways, foyers and living spaces.

consoles.Name: Liza Console
consoles.Body: Sporting a sturdy silhouette with monolithic legs and a thickset top, the Liza console has handcrafted rattan inlay with brass accents that lend an elevated aesthetic to it’s design.

consoles.Name: Long Tall Cosmos / Greige
consoles.Body: Elegant and fine in his detailing, Long Tall is a useful and beautiful way to store and display in any space. Made of solid Cosmos stone and fine steel framing and finished in a tonal semi-gloss, Long Tall is a play on tonality and tactility.

desks.Body: With her commanding oak legs and razor thin top, Earth is a contemporary play on geometry and scale. Constructed from either European oak or American walnut, featuring a handy built-in storage shelf. The Earth desk conveys presence and permanence in a space.

la-banda_.Name: Pepé Side Table
la-banda_.Body: Constructed from ash and walnut veneer atop a solid timber and steel frame, Pepé sits comfortably in myriad spaces within the home. Suited as a bedside table, an end table alongside a sofa or as a sculptural accent piece in hallways or other parts of the home.

la-banda_.Name: Luca Console
la-banda_.Body: Meet Luca, a console whose proportions are substantial and delicate in equal measure. Constructed from ash and walnut veneer atop a solid timber and steel frame, Luca is best used as a sculptural focal point within hallways, foyers and living spaces.

mirrors.Name: Pièrre Floor Mirror
mirrors.Body: With nods to neoclassicism this versatile mirror is designed to make a statement. His steel structure exudes strength while rattan accents and spherical walnut feet design. Equally suitable for living spaces and bedrooms, Pièrre likes to be seen.

mirrors.Name: Gabriella Floor Mirror
mirrors.Body: With island vibes and a ‘70s style, the Gabriella mirror features hand-applied rattan detailing that will imbue your home with the spirit of summer all year round. Gabriella is available in a full-length floor or wall-mounted design.

shop-all-living-room.Body: A marriage of sophistication and form, modelled from two beach pebbles. Isola is sculpted from upcycled engineered timber, combining organic, sculptural form with the sophistication of a hand buffed piano gloss finish. Isola brings an effortless high design aesthetic to your living space.

shop-all-living-room.Name: Luca Console
shop-all-living-room.Body: Meet Luca, a console whose proportions are substantial and delicate in equal measure. Constructed from ash and walnut veneer atop a solid timber and steel frame, Luca is best used as a sculptural focal point within hallways, foyers and living spaces.

shop-all-living-room.Name: Pepé Side Table
shop-all-living-room.Body: Constructed from ash and walnut veneer atop a solid timber and steel frame, Pepé sits comfortably in myriad spaces within the home. Suited as a bedside table, an end table alongside a sofa or as a sculptural accent piece in hallways or other parts of the home.

shop-all-living-room.Name: Liza Console

shop-all-living-room.Name: Paloma Coffee Table
shop-all-living-room.Body: Strong, feminine curves with modern proportions. Hand crafted rattan inlay with brass accents. Paloma is detailed, design driven and one of a kind.

shop-all-living-room.Name: Freddie Side Table
shop-all-living-room.Body: Freddie is a versatile side table for smaller bedrooms or living areas. He also doubles as additional seating for extra unexpected guests. Freddie likes sunsets and listening to Bohemian Rhapsody on repeat - obviously.

shop-all-living-room.Name: Gabriella Floor Mirror
shop-all-living-room.Body: With island vibes and a ‘70s style, the Gabriella mirror features hand-applied rattan detailing that will imbue your home with the spirit of summer all year round. Gabriella is available in a full-length floor or wall-mounted design.

shop-all-living-room.Name: Pièrre Floor Mirror
shop-all-living-room.Body: With nods to neoclassicism this versatile mirror is designed to make a statement. His steel structure exudes strength while rattan accents and spherical walnut feet design. Equally suitable for living spaces and bedrooms, Pièrre likes to be seen.

shop-all-living-room.Name: Pièrre Side Table

Sitting atop 3 gloss steel legs that are tonally matched to the marble.

shop-all-rooms.Body: Taking inspiration from neoclassicist designs, the Pièrre side table has rattan details, playful spherical walnut feet and a creamy marble top.

shop-all-rooms.Name: Pièrre Floor Mirror
shop-all-rooms.Body: With nods to neoclassicism this versatile mirror is designed to make a statement. His steel structure exudes strength while rattan accents and spherical walnut feet design. Equally suitable for living spaces and bedrooms, Pièrre likes to be seen.

shop-all-rooms.Name: Pièrre Dining Chair
shop-all-rooms.Body: Strong steel legs, rattan details and playful spherical walnut feet contemporise the neoclassicist-inspired Pièrre dining chair, which features a soft and waxy leather seat cushion that will develop a graceful patina over time.

shop-all-rooms.Name: Pièrre Counter Stool
shop-all-rooms.Body: Characterised by undertones of neoclassicism, the Pièrre counter stool has strong steel legs, rattan details and playful spherical walnut feet. The cushion is aniline-dyed top-grain leather with a soft and waxy finish that will develop a beautiful patina over time and use.

shop-all-rooms.Name: Paloma Coffee Table
shop-all-rooms.Body: Strong, feminine curves with modern proportions. Hand crafted rattan inlay with brass accents. Paloma is detailed, design driven and one of a kind.

shop-all-rooms.Name: Liza Console
shop-all-rooms.Body: Sporting a sturdy silhouette with monolithic legs and a thickset top, the Liza console has handcrafted rattan inlay with brass accents that lend an elevated aesthetic to it’s design.

shop-all-rooms.Name: Freddie Side Table
shop-all-rooms.Body: Freddie is a versatile side table for smaller bedrooms or living areas. He also doubles as additional seating for extra unexpected guests. Freddie likes sunsets and listening to Bohemian Rhapsody on repeat - obviously.

shop-all-rooms.Name: Chub Coffee Table
shop-all-rooms.Body: With his chubby oak legs and thick marble top, Chub is a versatile addition to any living space. Compact in size but he packs a punch in design. Perfect for apartments and smaller spaces.

shop-all-rooms.Body: Monolithic in form, the Tide coffee table is a statement piece with a grounding energy. With her oak veneer legs and tempered glass top, she brings warmth and sophistication in equal measures.

shop-all-tables.Name: Piscina Side Table
shop-all-tables.Body: Piscina meaning “pool” in Italian lives up to her name through her beautiful pool shaped form. Designed as a nesting set alongside her coffee table sibling, Piscina is a tactile accent piece made from Cosmos marble carved into a smooth irregular shape. Sitting atop 3 gloss steel legs that are tonally matched to the marble. Suitable for living and bedroom spaces.

shop-all-tables.Name: Piscina Coffee Table
shop-all-tables.Body: Piscina meaning “pool” in Italian lives up to her name through her beautiful pool shaped form. Designed as a nesting set alongside her side table sibling, Piscina coffee table is a tactile centrepiece made from Cosmos marble carved into a smooth irregular shape. Sitting atop 3 gloss steel legs that are tonally matched to the marble.

shop-all-tables.Name: Pepé Side Table
shop-all-tables.Body: Constructed from ash and walnut veneer atop a solid timber and steel frame, Pepé sits comfortably in myriad spaces within the home. Suited as a bedside table, an end table alongside a sofa or as a sculptural accent piece in hallways or other parts of the home.

shop-all-tables.Name: Luca Console
shop-all-tables.Body: Meet Luca, a console whose proportions are substantial and delicate in equal measure. Constructed from ash and walnut veneer atop a solid timber and steel frame, Luca is best used as a sculptural focal point within hallways, foyers and living spaces.

shop-all-tables.Name: Isola Side Table
shop-all-tables.Body: A marriage of sophistication and form, modelled from two beach pebbles. Isola is sculpted from upcycled engineered timber, combining organic, sculptural form with the sophistication of a hand buffed piano gloss finish. Isola brings an effortless high design aesthetic to your living space.

shop-all-tables.Name: Pièrre Side Table
shop-all-tables.Body: Taking inspiration from neoclassicist designs, the Pièrre side table has rattan details, playful spherical walnut feet and a creamy marble top.

shop-all-tables.Name: Paloma Coffee Table
shop-all-tables.Body: Strong, feminine curves with modern proportions. Hand crafted rattan inlay with brass accents. Paloma is detailed, design driven and one of a kind.

shop-all-tables.Name: Liza Console
shop-all-tables.Body: Sporting a sturdy silhouette with monolithic legs and a thickset top, the Liza console has handcrafted rattan inlay with brass accents that lend an elevated aesthetic to it’s design.

shop-all-tables.Name: Freddie Side Table
shop-all-tables.Body: Freddie is a versatile side table for smaller bedrooms or living areas. He also doubles as additional seating for extra unexpected guests. Freddie likes sunsets and listening to Bohemian Rhapsody on repeat - obviously.

shop-all-tables.Name: Earth 150 Dining Table

storage.Name: Long Tall Cosmos / Greige
storage.Body: Elegant and fine in his detailing, Long Tall is a useful and beautiful way to store and display in any space. Made of solid Cosmos stone and fine steel framing and finished in a tonal semi-gloss, Long Tall is a play on tonality and tactility.

tables-storage.Name: Yoko Coffee Table (Capsule)
tables-storage.Body: The beauty of timber is highlighted by the bold geometric form of Yoko Coffee table. Inspired by Japanese minimalism, Yoko Coffee Table is a beautifully crafted design whose strength lies in simplicity. Made from solid timber veneer in Walnut or Oak.

tables-storage.Name: Yoko Coffee Table (Capsule)
tables-storage.Body: The beauty of timber is highlighted by the bold geometric form of Yoko Coffee table. Inspired by Japanese minimalism, Yoko Coffee Table is a beautifully crafted design whose strength lies in simplicity. Made from solid timber veneer in Walnut or Oak.

tables-storage.Name: Yoko Coffee Table (Square)

tables-storage.Name: Tide Rectangle Oak Coffee Table
tables-storage.Body: Monolithic in form, the Tide coffee table is a statement piece with a grounding energy. With her oak veneer legs and tempered glass top, she brings warmth and sophistication in equal measures.

tables-storage.Name: Isola Side Table
tables-storage.Body: A marriage of sophistication and form, modelled from two beach pebbles. Isola is sculpted from upcycled engineered timber, combining organic, sculptural form with the sophistication of a hand buffed piano gloss finish. Isola brings an effortless high design aesthetic to your living space.

tables-storage.Name: Tide Oak Coffee Table
tables-storage.Body: Monolithic in form, the Tide coffee table is a statement piece with a grounding energy. With her oak veneer legs and tempered glass top, she brings warmth and sophistication in equal measures.

tables-storage.Name: Luca Console
tables-storage.Body: Meet Luca, a console whose proportions are substantial and delicate in equal measure. Constructed from ash and walnut veneer atop a solid timber and steel frame, Luca is best used as a sculptural focal point within hallways, foyers and living spaces.

tables-storage.Name: Pepé Side Table
tables-storage.Body: Constructed from ash and walnut veneer atop a solid timber and steel frame, Pepé sits comfortably in myriad spaces within the home. Suited as a bedside table, an end table alongside a sofa or as a sculptural accent piece in hallways or other parts of the home.

tables-storage.Name: Paloma Coffee Table
tables-storage.Body: Strong, feminine curves with modern proportions. Hand crafted rattan inlay with brass accents. Paloma is detailed, design driven and one of a kind.

tables-storage.Name: Liza Console
tables-storage.Body: Sporting a sturdy silhouette with monolithic legs and a thickset top, the Liza console has handcrafted rattan inlay with brass accents that lend an elevated aesthetic to it’s design.

tables-storage.Name: Earth 180 Dining Table
tables-storage.Body: Commanding oak legs and razor thin top, Earth is a contemporary play on geometry and scale. Constructed from either European oak or American walnut, Earth conveys presence in a space.

tables-storage.Name: Earth 180 Dining Table
tables-storage.Body: Commanding oak legs and razor thin top, Earth is a contemporary play on geometry and scale. Constructed from either European oak or American walnut, Earth conveys presence in a space.

tables-storage.Name: Earth 220 Dining Table
tables-storage.Body: With commanding oak legs and razor thin top, Earth is a contemporary play on geometry and scale. Constructed from either European oak or American walnut, Earth conveys presence in a space.

tables-storage.Name: Earth 220 Dining Table
tables-storage.Body: With commanding oak legs and razor thin top, Earth is a contemporary play on geometry and scale. Constructed from either European oak or American walnut, Earth conveys presence in a space.

tables-storage.Name: Pièrre Side Table
tables-storage.Body: Taking inspiration from neoclassicist designs, the Pièrre side table has rattan details, playful spherical walnut feet and a creamy marble top.

tables-storage.Name: Freddie Side Table
tables-storage.Body: Freddie is a versatile side table for smaller bedrooms or living areas. He also doubles as additional seating for extra unexpected guests. Freddie likes sunsets and listening to Bohemian Rhapsody on repeat - obviously.

tables-storage.Name: Earth 150 Dining Table
tables-storage.Body: With her commanding oak legs and razor thin top, Earth is a contemporary play on geometry and scale. Constructed from either European oak or American walnut, Earth conveys presence and permanence in a space.

tables-storage.Name: Earth 150 Dining Table
tables-storage.Body: With her commanding oak legs and razor thin top, Earth is a contemporary play on geometry and scale. Constructed from either European oak or American walnut, Earth conveys presence and permanence in a space.

tables-storage.Name: Chub Coffee Table
tables-storage.Body: With his chubby oak legs and thick marble top, Chub is a versatile addition to any living space. Compact in size but he packs a punch in design. Perfect for apartments and smaller spaces.

tables-storage.Name: Piscina Coffee Table
tables-storage.Body: Piscina meaning “pool” in Italian lives up to her name through her beautiful pool shaped form. Designed as a nesting set alongside her side table sibling, Piscina coffee table is a tactile centrepiece made from Cosmos marble carved into a smooth irregular shape. Sitting atop 3 gloss steel legs that are tonally matched to the marble.

tables-storage.Name: Tide Square Coffee Table Antique White
tables-storage.Body: Monolithic in form, the Tide coffee table is a statement piece. With her polished Chrome or powder-coated Antique White metal legs and tempered glass top, she brings a modern sophistication to any space.
